Part 2: Cylindrical Object with a Tapered Top and Flat Bottom Create a new coordinate system with the same rotation as part 1 (euler angles = [0, 0, 0]) but with a different translation vector: [0.3536, 0.1982, 0.1487]. The object has a flat top and bottom, and a curved side with a central hole at the top. The length, width, and height of each intermediate part and the final shape are provided in the JSON description.</description>
